IMPMAL.alternativeInitiative.Name: Alternative Initiative
IMPMAL.alternativeInitiative.Hint: Use alternative initiative from the formula below. Requires restart.
IMPMAL.alternativeInitiativeFormula.Name: Alternative Initiative Formula
IMPMAL.computeDoublesAll.Name: Add Critical/Fumble on all tests
IMPMAL.computeDoublesAll.Hint: Not all tests add Critical/Fumble on tests. This will add a tag below the result.
IMPMAL.changeConditionImages.Name: Change Conditions/Effects images
IMPMAL.changeConditionImages.Hint: Will change (upon restart) the default condition images.
IMPMAL.changeConditionImagesPath.Name: Path to custom Conditions/Effects images
IMPMAL.changeConditionImagesPath.Hint: Change to your folder of images (need to be webp)
IMPMAL.alternativeMasterCrafted.Name: Alternative Master Crafted
IMPMAL.alternativeMasterCrafted.Hint: Reduces the amount of Armour Master Crafted quality gives to Armour from +2 to +1, except for Power armour.
IMPMAL.alternativeRend.Name: Boosted Rend
IMPMAL.alternativeRend.Hint: The Rend trait gains Penetrating equal to 1/2 of Rend, rounded down.
IMPMAL.tokenRuler.Name: Token Movement Measurement
IMPMAL.tokenRuler.Hint: When you drag a token, the ruler will change color based on speed.
IMPMAL.activeSuperiority.Name: Active Superiority
IMPMAL.activeSuperiority.Hint: Split Superiority between Allied and Enemy, use a different version of rules.
IMPMAL.SuperioritySpend.Title: Superiority Spend
IMPMAL.SuperioritySpend.Custom.Name: Custom
IMPMAL.SuperioritySpend.MakeCount.Name: Make it Count (Variable)
IMPMAL.SuperioritySpend.LittleBoost.Name: Little Boost (-1)
IMPMAL.SuperioritySpend.FleeHarm.Name: Flee from Harm (-2)
IMPMAL.SuperioritySpend.BreakDown.Name: Break Down (-5)
IMPMAL.SuperiorityGain.Title: Superiority Gain
IMPMAL.SuperiorityGain.Custom.Name: Custom
IMPMAL.SuperiorityGain.Surprise.Name: Surprise (+2)
IMPMAL.SuperiorityGain.SizeUp.Name: Size Up (+2)
IMPMAL.SuperiorityGain.SizeUp5.Name: Size Up [+5 SL] (+3)
IMPMAL.SuperiorityGain.Victory.Name: Victory (+1)
IMPMAL.SuperiorityGain.Winning.Name: Winning (+1)
IMPMAL.SuperiorityGain.Outmanoeuvre.Name: Outmanoeuvre (+1)
IMPMAL.SuperiorityGain.WoundedPride.Name: Wounded Pride [Enemy Only] (+1)
